outputFile.comment: The path to save the generated image
width.comment: The width, in pixels to generate the image. Default is 480
height.comment: The height, in pixels to generate the image. Default is 320
sleepInterval.comment: The amount of time, in seconds, the script should wait before data gathering and image creation again
colorBackground.comment: The background color of the image expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
colorTextFG.comment: The color of the header text expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
dataDirectory.comment: The path to store extracted files. A subfolder for ordinals will be created if it doesnt exist.
exportFilesToDataDirectory.comment: Indicates whether files should exported to the data directory.
saveUniqueImageNames.comment: Indicates whether unique image names should be created for each inscription.
overlayTextEnabled.comment: Indicates whether annotations should be labeled over the image to display the transaction id, content type and size
overlayExifEnabled.comment: Indicates whether key exif data found in images should be labeled over the image in the annotation block
overlayTextColorBG.comment: If overlayTextEnabled is true, this is the color of the annotation text background overlay expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
overlayTextColorFG.comment: If overlayTextEnabled is true, this is the color of the annotation text expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
